table.name: vtiger_salesorder
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_salesorder` ( `salesorderid` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `subject` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `potentialid` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `customerno` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `salesorder_no` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `quoteid` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `vendorterms` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `contactid` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `vendorid` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `duedate` date DEFAULT NULL, `carrier` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `pending` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `type` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `adjustment` decimal(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `salescommission` decimal(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `exciseduty` decimal(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `total` decimal(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `subtotal` decimal(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `taxtype` varchar(25) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `discount_percent` decimal(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `discount_amount` decimal(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `s_h_amount` decimal(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `accountid` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `terms_conditions` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `purchaseorder` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `sostatus` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `currency_id` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `conversion_rate` decimal(10,3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1.000', `enable_recurring` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `pre_tax_total` decimal(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `s_h_percent` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `closing_week` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `division` varchar(240) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `selforintro` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `closingarea` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `outcome` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `salesamount` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `kikaku` varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `costall` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `costinfo` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `costnew` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `baitai` varchar(240) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `acfrom` varchar(240) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `costsyanai` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `costsyanaikb` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `mokuhyou` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `amount` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `order_destination_01` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `order_cost_01` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `order_destination_02` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `order_cost_02` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `order_destination_03` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `order_cost_03` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `order_destination_04` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `order_cost_04` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `order_destination_05` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `order_cost_05` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `order_content` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `add_gross` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `seo_gross` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `rseo_gross` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `create_gross` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `rumor_gross` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `direction` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `sales_gross` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `result_conditions` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `contract_startdate` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `contract_enddate` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `payment_date` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `r_genre` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `section` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `publisher` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `billing_dates` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `payment_due_date` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `bonus` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `r_situation` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `margin_01` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `margin_02` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `margin_03` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `margin_04` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `margin_05` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `dv_name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `margin_rate` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `update_interval` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `update_notification` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `conf1_dates` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `conf2_dates` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `conf3_dates` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `charge1` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `charge2` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `charge3` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`salesorderid`), KEY `salesorder_vendorid_idx` (`vendorid`), KEY `salesorder_contactid_idx` (`contactid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci

table.name: vtiger_salesordercf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_salesordercf` ( `salesorderid` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`salesorderid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci

picklistvalues.picklistvalue: リクルート(新卒・CIN請求）
ネオキャリア(@type/女の転職)
毎日エージェンシー(アイデム)

cron.name: RecurringInvoice
cron.description: Recommended frequency for RecurringInvoice is 12 hours
